Reviews.Title: Good entry level phone
Reviews.Author: Pietro Grippo "PGS"
Reviews.Content: This is a very good entry level cell phone. The touch screen works good and  the internal memory is enough to have  the apps that I need. The size is fine and works in 3G with my operator.

Reviews.Title: Samsung DoubleTime I857 Unlocked GSM Phone with Android 2.2 OS, Review
Reviews.Author: Akiyia "akiyia"
Reviews.Content: I just got this phone.I look at a lot of phones and decided on this one.I so love it. I dont have a data package bc I didntwant to spend the extra money but the good thing aboutthis phone is it has WIFI and I can get on the internet without a data plan.. Yay...I love the keyboard also bc I Texted all the time.I am so happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great buy worth it!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Nelida Agosto
Reviews.Content: Great phone!!! Awesome touch screen it includes an sd slot which is great for when I download all the music I haveThere are no cons to this phone;works perfectly!I suggest if ur giving this to a teen buy a case and screen protectors.  The phone is heavier but it's not really a problem it has a stylish look more for a girl than a guyIt has 2 touch screens which is great and this phone is perfect for those ppl who don't have enough patience when it comes to virtual keyboards and if u like the virtual keyboard this has one 2. It is froyo which is a bit behind but there isn't much of a difference in speed and how the phone works. All in all great for anyone starting smart phones. I love it!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Unlock phone
Reviews.Author: jean paul Faydit
Reviews.Content: The Samsung DoubleTime I857 that I purchase from PMG distributor was more that expected.When I check this phone for its specifications it didn't say it got WIFI available, so that was really good.This seller send me a brand new phone, as expected.You need yo use a code to use it as you want, so be aware of it. You'll find it in the box. I did not knew that but after contacting the seller, they answer quickly to my issue, and gave me that code again so I could start use the ing it tight away.Also I arrived in time, as expected too.I recommend both, the phone and the seller!

Reviews.Title: samsung double time I857
Reviews.Author: Angela Folson
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone and will work sufficiently for my 73 year old mother who is actually enjoying it. However, if you have 4g service with your cell phone provider then this may not be the phone for you. I actually initially bought the phone for myself because I had dropped and cracked my screen on my Galaxy Exhibit so I thought I would find something cheaper, and after searching came across this phone which is nice, but the software is not capatible for the apps that i use so I gave it to my mother. Overall it is a nice phone and great for texting because of the external keyboard which is what I prefer on phones, but it won't store many apps because of the software. A very good and simple phone, but not for high tech use.

Reviews.Title: fantastic samsung doubletime unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: Billy J.
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for two reasons the first was to try an android smart phone for the first time at what I felt was affordable and the second was to remove the contract noose from around my neck. The phone is all I had hoped for and more.  I haven't found anything that I don't like about it.  It may be a little slow on the net but I expected that for android 2.2 and an older processor versus a newer model.  Now that I know I like it I will upgrade to something like the SIII in the future.  As for the noose I dropped AT&T; after years as a customer.  I purchased a Straight Talk sim card and an unlimited plan at $45.00 a month and now I use AT&T; towers for a third of the cost.  What a deal.  Love it so much I purchased one for my wife and daughter who both love theirs.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Kristen Duhaime
Reviews.Content: I love everything about this phone! It works great, the flip open keyboard is a wonderful feature. Works like a charm wouldn't trade it for any other phone!!! Delivery was very fast too! All over I had a great experience with this phone and the seller!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: I love this phone, it is the second one that I have bought.  I can not stand the thought of not being able to type anymore when I want to text. Thank you so much.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Engelbert Gomez
Reviews.Content: I'm really satisfy with the product, it's a very good technology... I love it... I really liked... Excellent service, good

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: tracy j montanaro
Reviews.Content: this was great it worked fine and the code was easy to put in love it ty will recommend to friends

Reviews.Title: Samsung Double Time
Reviews.Author: Trin's new phone
Reviews.Content: I Love this phone and all the features, haven't found a problem with any of it and I have foind several extra accessories!

Reviews.Title: Old and getting older.  Don't waste your time.
Reviews.Author: zerolagtime
Reviews.Content: This phone is getting no updates from Samsung or any carrier.  It gets very slow less than 30 days after you start to use it.  Even if you add an extra SD card, most of the apps you care about insist on going on the internal memory card, which is WAY too small.  We only got this phone because of the dedicated keyboard that provides nice tactile feedback during texting.  Really wish there was a better alternative than the $400 phones.

Reviews.Title: Terribly battery life.
Reviews.Author: A. Bloom "Deth"
Reviews.Content: Seller experience was excellent.The product itself? Not so much. I replaced a dead Samsung Sidekick with this, and the battery dies within a couple hours, with normal use. I have since replaced this phone with the Galaxy S4, and this one is back in its box.

Reviews.Title: Battery has very short life.
Reviews.Author: KariP
Reviews.Content: The battery for this phone only stays charged about 6 to 7 hours so sometimes it has to be charged twice a day. A real bummer :(

Reviews.Title: price
Reviews.Author: lola
Reviews.Content: great for the price touch screen very sensitive but love the key pad letter are larger than my old phone

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Terrie
Reviews.Content: I chose four stars for this product because its an amazing phone. All the apps and buttons work properly it came with all of the proper accessories ( battery  and phone back) , The phone came practically knew minus a few scratches, I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE this phone
Reviews.Author: Alise Gardner
Reviews.Content: I LOVE this phone. I was worried because of all the negative things I was reading about it but I decided to try it anyway and I'm very very happy I did. I don't have one negative thing to say about this phone. It's better than what I was expecting.

Reviews.Title: very good for its price
Reviews.Author: giovanni
Reviews.Content: amazon safe as alwaysthe only bad thing about this phone  is the memory but the rest is finedont forget to get some extra memory

Reviews.Title: An okay phone
Reviews.Author: Jajing
Reviews.Content: I brought this to be my first venture into the land of smartphones and texting. I thought I could not give a manual keyboard which is the primary reason why I brought it. Once I learned how to text with a stylus, the Qwerty keyboard became unnecessary. I sent this one back because it was defective. Returning it was fast and without any problems.

Reviews.Title: Works good :))unlocked
Reviews.Author: Liberty Card "victoria sukhi"
Reviews.Content: Works fine:)Unlocked I used a sim card.Wi fi is OK.Volume is OK.Internet working fine.I did not find any problem.buy it

Reviews.Title: Not happy with phone!
Reviews.Author: Meagan
Reviews.Content: Phone was to be new but must have been a second because it doesn't work properly. Not at all happy with it.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Stephy Alapatt
Reviews.Content: Good phone. The only problem is that you can barley hear the other side sometimes and the battery runs out quick.

Reviews.Title: samsung doubletime
Reviews.Author: anoynamous
Reviews.Content: this phone itself  is a good phone, and has good features but the  one i purchased was very slow and it kept on breaking

Reviews.Title: Hate it and here's why....
Reviews.Author: The Hansen's
Reviews.Content: The phone itself is pretty cool. Has dual touch screen which is neat. Has Google play store which is nice cause I like android phones.  The qwerty keyboard is nice, it has raised buttons and they are spread out good. The TOTAL DOWNFALL on this phone is the memory. I put a 32GB memory card in it but it was no good. I put the apps on the memory card but it still took up all the internal memory. AND it has NO internal memory, like 856 MB which ain't nothing. SO if you like to use apps this is not for you. If you dont use alot of apps you would probably like it. It just wasn't for me...

Reviews.Title: straight talk sim wouldn't work in this phone
Reviews.Author: krys
Reviews.Content: my straight talk sim wouldn't work in this phone...it tells me to insert a new sim...What do i do? Isn't the phone supposed to be unlocked???

Reviews.Title: buen equipo 100% funcional
Reviews.Author: David D'Lacoste
Reviews.Content: para las personas que necesitan un celular y que el mismo sea funcional para sus exigencias personales... este es lo que necesitas

Reviews.Title: terrible phone,.
Reviews.Author: R Godfrey
Reviews.Content: I wanted this phone for a long time and finally got it.but it doesnt have enough memory on it or in it.,even with sd card i would have to delete alot of my stuff,apps that i needed,

Reviews.Title: Do not get the phone
Reviews.Author: SHUFFLES
Reviews.Content: It is a horrible phone trust me do not get it you have been warned it is a crappy phone would not recomemmend for anyone

Reviews.Title: BASIC manuvers only on this one...SingleTime.
Reviews.Author: TNT
Reviews.Content: I like Samsung products when it comes to phones, but this one is a true disappointment.  The battery life is truly horrible.  I must charge it 2x a day and have it plugged in overnight.  Outside of texting this phone is not very useful.  It seems to have to think before performing any action...even the texting.  Forget about apps, downloading, etc.  This phone is not capable. I would not pay over $50 brand new for this phone.  It would work for a tween/young teen who is mainly into texting...but anything else is truly limited in response and timing.  This phone will be a "gift" to someone younger and I will purchase another.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT BUY!
Reviews.Author: zachary
Reviews.Content: Don't buy!!!! Worst phone of my life. It's battery sux, you can't have any apps or anything at all or it takes ALL your memory even with an sd card.
